Blog Post August 31, 2025

Simple multiplication games

AI created single HTML multiplication games

Try out Z's single HTML web app to teach multiplication here

Try out Qwen's single HTML web app to teach multiplication here

These are simple mulitplication games created by AI.

For the most part, I started off by asking the AI to think about innovative ways to teach 5 to 10 year old multiplication.

Then I followed up by asking the AI to pick one of it's suggestions, ideally a simplier one, and then create a single page HTML web app.

Z took 2 passes to get it functionally working - I forgot what and I'm too lazy to look in the logs just right now to see what was wrong.

Qwen (specifically Qwen3-Coder) got a working app on it's first try.
